snippet.title: Art of Guile Trailer #1
snippet.description:
Art of Guile Trailer #1 (Alpha 6.5) by Unphysical Machinery

All footage in this trailer is 100% in-game footage.

Fight in epic battles against your foes whether it is with a friend or on your own. Use strategy to your advantage, choose either infantry, tank or air forces; or use a combination of all three. Research and upgrade new abilities for your units. Diminish your foes and bring dominance to the battlefield!

Credits:
Footage: Thor Youlton
Editor: Erkam Dutoğlu
Animation Artist: Furkan Dutoğlu
Music and Composers (Ordered List):
"Pressure" by yd
"Doomed" by Alexander Ehlers 

Links:
Steam Greenlight: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=622328923
IndieDB: http://www.indiedb.com/games/art-of-guile

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Normal Description
Hope you enjoy this video, if you did then don't forget to leave a like, feedback is always appreciated, sharing helps the community grow and if you want to see more of these videos then don't forget to subscribe to get notified whenever I upload a new video.

Partnership
Join Freedom! today: https://www.freedom.tm/via/TheGangstarTY

More places you can find me!
My Website: http://thegangstarty.webs.com/
My Google+ Page: https://plus.google.com/114985040537083667578/posts
My Twitter: https://twitter.com/ThorYoulton
My Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/thegangstarty?ref=aymt_homepage_panel

Where do I get my mods from?
Star Wars Battlefront 1 and 2
SWBFGamers: http://www.swbfgamers.com/index.php

Thanks For Watching and have a great day!
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
